entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 12:12 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
